sub_topic: Prove that the Cartesian product of two sets is not associative with respect to intersection.
message_1:
Let A = {1, 2} and B = {3, 4}. Find 
(A x B) ∩ B
and 
A x (B ∩ {3}) 
and show that the results demonstrate that the Cartesian product of two sets is not associative with respect to intersection.
